product_name: The North Face Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from a heavyweight, luxuriously soft fleece, The North Face Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for women keeps you warm and comfortable from your front door to the backcountry. 100% polyester fleece is smooth on the outside and soft, plush and cozy on the inside. Provides excellent insulation over a shirt and under a shell. Zippered hand pockets; reverse-coil center-front zipper. The North Face Morningside Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for women features ergonomic seaming and a tonal embroidered logo. Closeout.
short_description: Made from a heavyweight, luxuriously soft fleece, The North Face Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for women keeps you warm and comfortable from your front door to the backcountry.
